about_the_game:
A little story about obsession and personal growth. And sex.

The Premise

Errol is a ghost with one thing on his mind: losing his virginity. He refuses to join the afterlife until he has scored with a woman. But after doing just that, he is still stuck in the world of the living...

Vivienne, Errol's roommate, recruits the help of Anita Dicking, a medium, biographer, podcaster, and unlicensed therapist. Together they review the events leading to Errol's big triumph to see if they can discover what's truly anchoring him to the world of the living...

The Gameplay

  • Super short VN game. Somewhere around 30 minutes or less.
  • Linear story. None of those pesky multiple choices, empty open worlds, or free will.
  • The story unfolds in short chapters that can be revisited if you'd like.
  • Learn the art of Seduction from a ghost who spent over 100 years trying to get laid.

Sexy Stuff

  • Voyeurism
  • Assisted masturbation
  • Vanilla sex

Less Sexy, Technical Stuff

  • Interview with the Horny Ghost is as free as it is short: VERY! Love it, or your money back...
  • Feedback (and praise) is certainly appreciated!
  • If you'd like to support us, consider purchasing the Goodie Package DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements based mostly off of Unity's Minimum Requirement
